features.title: Offline + cloud fusion cache
features.description: Bundle workspace caches so Echo Computer boots cleanly offline while mirroring cloud telemetry once online.
features.impact: Keeps the coding environment resilient during air-gapped windows and syncs context when back on the network.
blueprint: Pre-bake npm and Python caches into `workspaces/offline-cache` with a refresh script and checksum report.
Detect offline mode at startup and render a status banner while deferring cloud telemetry calls.
Sync cached runs to the cloud once connectivity returns via a lightweight `/offline/replay` endpoint.

features.title: Burst prewarm multi-runner
features.description: Queue Python and Node executions through a warm pool so chained runs feel instantaneous.
features.impact: Cuts polyglot feedback loops below five seconds for most scripts while keeping logs coherent.
blueprint: Add a runner toggle that pre-warms the next language container when the current run is >50% complete.
Stream per-language stdout/stderr with timestamps so latency regressions are obvious.
Persist merged logs plus timing metadata to `workspaces/<user>/logs/burst-prewarm.json`.

features.title: Latency console HUD
features.description: Expose a live console that visualises queue, start, and teardown timings for every sandbox run.
features.impact: Gives Echo instant awareness of runner pressure before launching the next upgrade.
blueprint: Instrument the Node server with structured telemetry events emitted over WebSocket.
Aggregate events in the client and render sparkline charts beside the terminal.
Add alert thresholds so spikes over 2Ã— baseline get highlighted with recovery tips.

features.title: Luminary overlay deck
features.description: Ship the narrative overlay cards that keep palette, soundtrack, and intent visible mid-run.
features.impact: Aligns creative direction with engineering execution during every sandbox session.
blueprint: Expose a `/signals/luminary` endpoint returning the active overlay payload.
Render collapsible cards beside the editor with keyboard shortcuts for focus mode.
Allow saving overlay revisions with each workspace checkpoint for later playback.

features.title: Atlas skyway prompts
features.description: Map Echo Computer scenes to Echo Atlas beats via contextual prompt panels.
features.impact: Keeps writers, artists, and engineers synced on the same storyline arcs.
blueprint: Ingest atlas metadata + pulse notes to build per-project context capsules.
Design a dockable split-panel that can anchor on either side of the editor.
Experiment with emoji-rich markdown syntax for mood and intent annotations.

features.title: Reviewer ground-station
features.description: Surface who last touched each workspace file and auto-suggest handoff partners.
features.impact: Reduces async coordination time by highlighting ready reviewers plus runbooks.
blueprint: Ingest the latest git commits for every workspace file and cache author metadata.
Display avatars + reviewer suggestions beside the file tree with copy-to-clipboard run commands.
Offer a `/handoff/ground-station` JSON feed for downstream notifications.

features.title: Collaboration field console
features.description: Bundle reviewer radar, telemetry snippets, and TODO prompts into a single shareable console view.
features.impact: Lets every operator publish a ready-to-run upgrade packet directly from Echo Computer.
blueprint: Add a `/handoff/kits` endpoint that aggregates commits, test runs, and outstanding questions.
Render a collapsible console with copy-to-clipboard runbooks and reviewer tags.
Expose a webhook-friendly JSON payload for async channel broadcasts.

features.title: Resilient cloud upgrade lane
features.description: Stand up a blue/green lane for Echo Computer cloud services so upgrades stay interruption-free.
features.impact: Gives Echo instant rollback + smoke-test coverage while shipping new compute endpoints.
blueprint: Provision paired staging + canary environments with health probes that mirror production requests.
Wire deployment scripts to shift traffic gradually using feature flags and per-endpoint weights.
Capture latency/error deltas per phase into `cloud/upgrade-lane-metrics.json` for post-run review.

features.title: Cloud observability radar
features.description: Curate a single radar dashboard that fuses runner logs, build artifacts, and uptime signals.
features.impact: Keeps Echo aware of cloud drift and resource pressure before they impact local runs.
blueprint: Stream structured logs from app + worker pods into a unified OpenTelemetry collector.
Design a compact radar view showing error budgets, saturation, and dependency health in one card.
Publish a `/cloud/radar` JSON feed so rituals and handoff kits can quote the latest snapshots.

features.title: Echo cache accelerator
features.description: Layer a workspace-aware cache in front of the runner so repeated calls reuse compiled artifacts.
features.impact: Shrinks rebuild times for common toolchains and keeps paired languages in sync during rapid runs.
blueprint: Detect deterministic build outputs (node_modules, venv) and store them per-branch in a warm cache lane.
Expose a cache hit/miss HUD inside the terminal footer with guidance to refresh or pin versions.
Add a `echo-cache inspect` command that prints current keys, sizes, and invalidation signals.

features.title: Upgrade orchestrator lane
features.description: Provide a single dashboard to stage, approve, and verify Echo Computer upgrades.
features.impact: Turns upgrade planning into a repeatable checklist with explicit rollback and verification gates.
blueprint: Add an `upgrade/orchestrator` endpoint that lists pending updates, owners, and planned windows.
Surface pre-flight checks (dependency health, smoke tests, backup status) as blocking gates.
Export a signed upgrade report to `cloud/upgrade-orchestrator.json` for auditing.

features.title: Ops journal co-author
features.description: Co-author a running journal entry from telemetry snippets, TODOs, and reviewer replies inside Echo Computer.
features.impact: Keeps the full upgrade story in one place while pairing or handing off across timezones.
blueprint: Capture telemetry snippets and command outputs into a markdown buffer with attribution.
Offer AI-suggested section headers (Context, Risks, Next) that can be toggled inline.
Publish the journal to `/handoff/journal` with signed hashes for downstream packaging.
